snippet.title: The Abandoned Planet - Act 3 Tram Teaser
snippet.description:
A teaser for the game "The Abandoned Planet", a classic, Myst-esque, point and click adventure game about an astronaut stranded on an alien world. You'll experience her daring adventure in a unique 2D first-person perspective, all in glorious, vibrant, and colorful pixel art. 

Play the demo and wishlist the game here: 
• https://bit.ly/3OcrQFp

Follow the development
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/DexterStardust
• Mastadon: https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@dexterstardust
• Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/dexterstardust/

Buy my other game, Dexter Stardust: Adventures in Outer Space. A cartoon, sci-fi, point and click adventure game. Fully voice acted, it's like playing a Saturday Morning Cartoon!
• Steam (PC and MAC): https://bit.ly/3RBHRHc
• Nintendo Switch: https://bit.ly/3geXyqK
• iOS: https://apple.co/3Qnbtak 

dexterstardust.com
